entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: Centaurs are mentioned as being hardly ever good at something, implying they have some level of competence after years of practice. They are also said to sometimes read things wrongly.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who has had human teachers before and is now learning from a centaur teacher. He seems to be confused about the lesson and wants more details about the war they are about to have.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who shares his confusion about the lesson and also wants more details about the war.

entities.name: the centaur teacher
entities.description: The centaur teacher is described as being unlike any human teacher Harry has had before. He prioritizes teaching that nothing is foolproof over actually teaching his students what he knows.

relationships.description: Harry is a student of the centaur teacher, who is trying to teach him that nothing is foolproof.
Ron is also a student of the centaur teacher and shares Harry's confusion about the lesson.
Harry and Ron are friends who share their confusion about the lesson and want more details about the war they are about to have.
